Headline: #57 Laramie Temporary Reroute near Laramie/Kinzie
ShortDescription: 57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted via Laramie, Chicago, Central, Washington and Laramie: due to, street blockage near Laramie/Kinzie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Laramie, Chicago, Central, Washington, Laramie and over regular route, due to street blockage near Laramie/Kinzie.

Allow extra travel time.
